data.text: -You look great, man. Thanks for coming back to the show.

data.text: -I want to hear about your 50th birthday.

data.text: -50th birthday. -50.

data.text: You'd go out to dinner with the family, something like that.

data.text: And then the day came, and I was like, "Ooh."
